manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids Mini Broom and Dustpan Set - Small Toddlers Broom for Boys and Girls, Toy Broom Cleaning Set Combo Why do we design this product? My daughter is getting more and more into the 'imitate everyone' phase, and she is obsessed with trying to help sweep, but can't handle a full-size broom. She runs around following mom and dad when they sweep the floor now learning how herself. Absolutely adorable and a great way to start early teaching cleanup skills! Children love to help out their parents and this small broom and dustpan set allows your little ones to pitch in with the housework. The broom stands upright when clipped into the dustpan to make it easy to store and there are a few colors to choose from. It's also super cute.Great Training Toy: The broom is not only a toy for toddlers, but also a good training tool for kids to know help their family do some housework.The broom cleaning set will let your babies learn to help their parents. Kid could use the broom set to clean corner and home floor.

broom and dustpan set for home & kids cleaning set This is a housekeeping cleaning training tools for kids, cultivate gadgets for children to help with housework. Let the child be a happy little helper Of course, this small broom and dustpan can be used for cleaning office work desk,pet nest,toilet,bathroom,bedroom,kitchen ect. This toddler broom and cleaning set are light and cute, and children will like it at first glance. When using it, it can promote parent-child relationship and enhance the children's interest and ability to do housework while playing. The small broom and dustpan set is guaranteed , but please pay attention to safety when assembling the broom for kids. If the product you received is missing or damaged, we will solve the problem for you as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and fun
reviews.reviewText: Baby loves it and I use it every once in a while for little clean ups. Super cute and useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I hoped for!
reviews.reviewText: This arrived promptly, was easy to assemble and was a perfect size. Such a cute pink broom with dustpan! The bear on the top is just as shown& it does stand up when placed together. Since my little is just over 2yrs old, we don’t use it to sweep up too much, except to mimic Rupunzel and her daily routine. If your little plays hard, the handle might snap from the head, but my little plays a little more gently and it’s held up well— even when dropping it often &slamming it down a few times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this! She sweeps with me. I stepped on the dust pan and broke it but it was toddler durable! I need to re-purchase because I want her to have the full set again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and actually quite useful!
reviews.reviewText: I'm an adult without kids who loves common household items shaped like animals, and this set actually really comes in handy. I break it out for small tasks that don't require a full-sized broom, so it basically took the place of my chunky handheld brush. In fact, it's more effective in corners and along the baseboards of my walls because the bristles are longer and more flexible. The handle of the mini-broom comes up to my knees, which is still quite compact but allows me to get under things like couches and cabinets easily with less bending over.There are a couple quality issues. The dust pan is slightly misshapen, so it doesn't lay totally flat on the floor. I have to press down during use to make sure crumbs don't just fly underneath. A chunk of the bristles on one side were in disarray when it arrived too, meaning they stick out farther than the rest.However, these are the same flaws I've seen with grown-up versions that are made of cheap plastic in this price range, and I love having a small dust pan that stands up on its own. Due to the hump in the front, debris stays inside very securely when I walk around with it, which is nice too! It's a pretty great cleaning tool for something that's technically a toy, and the set brightens my day simply because it's so cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Brakes rather easy
reviews.reviewText: The dust pan broke very easy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves this little broom and dust pan. She’s almost 2 yrs old. Good size for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleaning made cute - you’re worth it!
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest broom and pan. I’m a 30-something adult who wants life to feel fun.As others have said, it’s pink, there’s a bear face, just buy it! You’re worth this cute silly tool to help stay tidy!Bought for adhd-like brain to keep in a bedroom to tidy in small bursts. I sometimes sweep just to “play” with the pink bear broom. It stands up on its own and doesn’t topple when cats rub against it. I love having this little broom so I don’t have to walk all the way to the kitchen to grab the big broom and risk distraction from the task at hand (a tip from KC Davis of StruggleCare). Great for the gloomy winter months when cleaning motivation is low. Would buy again!
